title: Fixed issue where self-sends didn't auto download.

body:
1) There was an issue where we wouldn't auto-download group syncs.
2) There was another issue where we didn't show the download controls
   for messages you sent yourself.

This PR addresses both of these.

Fixes #7920

**Test Devices**
* [Google Pixel, Android 8.1, API 27](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel-8346.php)

issue.title: Images sent from desktop slave to groups show as blank in master device
issue.body:
- [x] I have searched open and closed issues for duplicates
- [x] I am submitting a bug report for existing functionality that does not work as intended
- [x] I have read https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/wiki/Submitting-useful-bug-reports
- [x] This isn't a feature request or a discussion topic

----------------------------------------

### Bug description
Images you send yourself from the slave desktop client show as blank on the master Android client. This affects only groups, not 1-to-1 conversations. I tested with three groups. In two groups I have all the members in my Android contacts app. In one group there's one member that's not in my contacts. One group also has a member who uninstalled Signal long time ago. However, none of this seems to matter as the result is the same blank image in all groups.

### Steps to reproduce
- send an image to a group from the Desktop client
- view the group on your Android master device

**Actual result:** The image is shown as blank space, tapping it doesn't do anything
**Expected result:** Image should render, tapping it should open the gallery view

### Screenshots
![screenshot_20180621-113757](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/174176/41707956-0216022a-7548-11e8-8d9d-73a883257233.png)

### Device info
<!-- replace the examples with your info -->
**Device:** Lenovo Moto G4 Play
**Android version:** 7.1.1
**Signal version:** 4.21.2
**Desktop version:** 1.13.0-beta.1
